column2: ourist arrivals by purpose of visit
An analysis of tourist arrivals by purpose of visit reveals that a majority 55% of tourists had
visited Sri Lanka for pleasure/vacation, while for 20% of tourists the main purpose was visiting
friends and relatives. Only 4% of tourists had visited for business related purposes. 6% had
